## IProject interface

A Theatre project

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface IProject 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [address](./core.iproject.address.md) | ProjectAddress | The project's address |
|  [isReady](./core.iproject.isready.md) | boolean | Shows whether the project is ready to be used. Better to use [IProject.ready](./core.iproject.ready.md)<!-- -->, which is a promise that would resolve when the project is ready. |
|  [ready](./core.iproject.ready.md) | Promise&lt;void&gt; | If <code>@theatre/studio</code> is used, this promise would resolve when studio has loaded the state of the project into memory.<!-- -->If <code>@theatre/studio</code> is not used, this promise is already resolved. |
|  [type](./core.iproject.type.md) | 'Theatre\_Project\_PublicAPI' |  |
